DOC.brief_title: Intra-Operative Metrics With CENTURION速 INFINITI速 Vision Systems
DOC.criteria: Eligible undergo cataract extraction via phacoemulsification primary ACRYSOF Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) implantation ; Free severe disease ( ) /condition ( ) list `` Warnings '' `` Precautions '' section implant ACRYSOF IOL ; Willing undergo second eye surgery within 14 day first eye surgery ; Willing able understand/sign write Informed Consent Document ; Willing able return schedule followup examination ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Planned multiple procedure time surgery course study ( eg , LASIK , LRI , etc . ) ; Previous intraocular corneal surgery kind ; Poorly dilate pupil ; Severe retinal disorder ( eg , macular degeneration , proliferative diabetic retinopathy ) ; Corneal disease ( eg , herpes simplex , herpes zoster , etc ) retinal detachment ; Severe condition per Investigator 's clinical judgment would increase operative risk confound result investigation ; Female patient pregnant , lactating , plan pregnant course study ; Currently participate another drug device clinical trial , participate another drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment trial ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
